epic.description:
Implement HAIAMM Governance function practices to establish AI security strategy, policies, and education.

## Overview

The Governance function answers: *How do you govern AI security?*

## Practices Included

| Practice | Code | Purpose |
|----------|------|---------|
| Strategy & Metrics | SM | Define AI security strategy and measure effectiveness |
| Policy & Compliance | PC | Establish policies and ensure regulatory compliance |
| Education & Guidance | EG | Train teams on AI security best practices |

## Target Maturity

- [ ] Level 1: Foundation
- [ ] Level 2: Structured
- [ ] Level 3: Optimized

## Success Criteria

- AI security strategy documented and approved
- AI policies published and communicated
- Training program established
- Metrics dashboard operational

## References

- [HAIAMM Handbook](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/handbook/00-INDEX.md)
- [Level 1 Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/level1-foundation-checklist.md)
